attributes.action: reject the proposal to add folic acid to bread.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The addition of folic acid to all bread should be rejected on the grounds that folic acid is easily obtainable naturally by eating a healthy varied diet.
To add it to bread is to force the entire population to be treated for a deficiency in the few, regardless of personal opinion on food additives in general and government sponored doctoring of a staple food.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
